movies.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: The Wolf of Wall Street is a 2013 American biographical black comedy crime film directed by Martin Scorsese

movies.name: Shrek
movies.description: Shrek is a 2001 American computer-animated fantasy comedy film loosely based on the 1990 book of the same name by William Steig.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.description: Epic science fiction film directed, written, co-produced and co-edited by James Cameron.
